Package de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids.Simple

Class AnimatedFluidTextureInfo

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids.Simple.AnimatedFluidTextureInfo
public class AnimatedFluidTextureInfo
extends java.lang.Object
Contains the info used for displaying animated fluids. Currently two animation types are possible: scrolling and sprite sheet animation. The x and y coordinates define the location in the corresponding sprite sheet not in pixels but in increments of textures.
  • animationFrames and fps are used by the sprite sheet animation.
  • scrollVector is used both for direction and speed of the scroll.
The additional infos currently define which animation type is used.
Author:
Florian Loher
See Also:
